critique: The document establishes a task force to coordinate ecosystem restoration efforts in the Gulf Coast region following the BP Deepwater Horizon Oil Spill. It emphasizes collaboration between federal, state, and tribal governments, as well as engagement with local stakeholders. The order aims to support economic vitality, enhance human health and safety, protect infrastructure, and sustain safe seafood and clean water. It also addresses the impacts of storms and climate change and seeks to preserve sites of historical and cultural significance.
